## Features
- Complete REST API to MCP server conversion
- Production-ready Nomad deployment
- Full CI/CD pipeline with security scanning

## Infrastructure
- Terragrunt modules for cloud-agnostic deployment
- Consul service discovery
- Vault secrets management
- Auto-scaling and monitoring
